org.epics.graphene.SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate

    Package Description
    org.epics.graphene  

    • Uses of SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate in org.epics.graphene

      Methods in org.epics.graphene that return SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate.aspectRatio(double ratio)
      Sets the width to height aspect ratio for the graph area.
      SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate.circleDiameter(int diameter)
      Sets the diameter of the circles drawn.
      SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate.drawCircles(boolean decision)
      Sets whether circles are drawn on the line at important values.
      SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate.interpolation(InterpolationScheme scheme)
      Sets the interpolation scheme of the line.
      SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate.lastValueColor(Color color)
      Sets the color of the circle drawn at the last value.
      SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate.maxValueColor(Color color)
      Sets the color of the circle drawn at the maximum value.
      SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate.minValueColor(Color color)
      Sets the color of the circle drawn at the minimum value.
      SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate SparklineGraph2DRenderer.newUpdate()
      Creates an object that allows updating of sparkline parameters.
      Methods in org.epics.graphene with parameters of type SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SparklineGraph2DRenderer.update(SparklineGraph2DRendererUpdate update)
      Applies the update to the renderer.
